special_text:
Reap–{2}{B}{G}: You may activate Jack's loyalty abilities twice this turn rather than once. [i](Activate this ability only once each turn and only as a sorcery. It costs {0} if a creature you controlled died this turn.)[/i]
[+1]: Mill two cards, then you may return a land card from your graveyard to your hand.
[-2]: You may discard a creature card. If you do, search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[-5]: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
